body_html: Nice, I knew there had to be a much better way. log(sigmoid(x)) is just -softplus(-x), and I can see in softplus_op.h that it deals with the same underflow / overflow issue I tried to solve here, but of course much more efficiently. Thanks!

body: Nice, I knew there had to be a much better way. `log(sigmoid(x))` is just `-softplus(-x)`, and I can see in `softplus_op.h` that it deals with the same underflow / overflow issue I tried to solve here, but of course much more efficiently. Thanks!
